articles.title: China forms video game ethics committee as part of crackdown - Engadget
articles.description: Chinese game developers now have to run the gauntlet of an ethics panel if they want a chance of making it to stores.
articles.content: The committee has already reviewed 20 games, rejecting nine of them outright and demanding changes to the other 11. It didn't name the titles or say what it found objectionable. China might not lift the pause on game approvals until February. The South China … [+347 chars]
